quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: Chinasoft International Ltd is an investment holding company that provides global technology software and information technology services. The Company operates through segments: the Technical Professional Services Group segment (TPG) and the Internet Information Technology Services Group segment (IIG). The Company's main business is the research and development of Artificial Intelligence Generated Content (AIGC), the sales of large model software and hardware, and the digital transformation service consulting of the pan-enterprise resource planning (ERP) model. The Company's main products include the Question Series solutions, large model application all-in-one machine, JointPilot artificial intelligence application platform and others. The Company mainly provides its services to water conservancy, transportation, government affairs platform, military industry, energy, education, finance and other fields. The Company conducts business in the domestic market and overseas markets.
